= Tutorials =

The following tutorials are available for using Spritely.

For most of these tutorials, the target audience is middle-school (grade 6-8) students. Lower grade students may likely require adult assistance for basic computer tasks, while higher grade students should be able to use these tutorials without assistance.

|| Tutorial 1 || [CreatingASimpleSprite How to create a simple sprite using Spritely] ||
|| Tutorial 2 || [BuildingAROMFile How to build a ROM file from your Spritely project] ||
